fundraisers.title: Cabrador: Uber, but with Dogs
fundraisers.story: My second group project at Epicodus was making a version of Uber where each driver would be accompanied by a dog.  I think this is a great idea, and would like to see it happen!  I will need to take some time without work to develop the project and learn how to make Android apps, and I will need to fund server and hosting costs.

contributions.name: Allie
contributions.comment: I loved your project, good luck!
